title: Enhancing Online Program Management and Design Competencies: Mathematics Education Specialist Course

context.prior_knowledge: Core mathematics education concepts and experience with online learning tools
context.additional_context: A customized course for corporate mathematics education program managers and designers, flexibly structured to accommodate employees' work schedules and learning time

learning_goals: Participants can identify at least three quality evaluation indicators for online math programs through survey-based research.
Participants can design and improve administrative processes for operating high-quality online math programs.
Participants can apply methods for measuring the effectiveness of online math courses through learner data analysis.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
